title: 2024 Microscopy Today Micrograph Awards
content: The results and images of the sixth Microscopy Today Micrograph Awards competition are shown on these pages and in the competition gallery on our website (Micrograph Finalist Gallery 2024 (https://microscopy.org/micrograph-finalist-gallery-2024)). The premise of the micrograph competition is that scientific images can be interesting and have significant visual impact. This year, submissions came from 21 countries and 17 US states. Evaluation by the judges was accomplished without knowing the names or affiliations of the submitters. Of the 25 finalist micrographs, shown on the July cover and in the Microscopy Today micrograph gallery, 6 were from the United States and 19 were from other countries.
